root.name: Dan Dare: Pilot of the Future
root.description: OverviewThis game was popular in the United Kingdom. Â Dan Dare was the lead character of the central strip of The Eagle comic. The Eagle comic being itself a U.K. based comic. The graphical style of the game draws on the orginal fifties version of Dan Dare, as opposed the version of Dan Dare used in the Eagle in the era of the games production.GameplayDan Dare 1 is a fairly standard 2D shoot 'em up platformer with some puzzle elements as well.
